title: A Big Week for PlayStation?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.28.22
description:
What is Greg Miller hiding?! Blessing and Tim talk about what could be a big week for PlayStation, Amazon Games studio head stepping down, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:20 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO recording is being delayed to Thursday with the episode going up on Friday. More on that in the Roper report.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:07:11 - Is it gonna be a big week for Playstation (AKA what is Greg hiding????) - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:12:12 - Sony has filed a new trademark for Knack - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:28:20 - Ad
00:29:20 - Amazon Games Studio Head Steps Down - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:38:15 - Coffee Talk creator Fahmi dies at 32 - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:39:20 - Do we know the name of the AEW game? - Ian Carey @ F4WOnline
00:45:30 - A One Piece RPG has been announced - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:50:20 - We’re getting a Sonic Cinematic Universe - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:55:40 - Out today
00:56:35 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: SnowBikeMike and Gary
